activities: Flaspohler Research Group, Inc., is a market research firm whose work is primarily in the business-to-business areas of risk transfer (insurance, reinsurance, brokerage).  In order to collect information from respondents on behalf of clients, we are provided with names, titles and email addresses of clients and prospects or organizations who engage us to conduct surveys.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data forwarded to us by EU/Swiss Clients, or collected while in the course of conducting surveys on behalf of EU/Swiss clients.  Data covered includes manually processed data.
